definition: the skilled practice of a practical occupation, do business
details:
noun
- the skilled practice of a practical occupation
= example: the skilled practice of a practical occupation
= synonyms: craft
- the commercial exchange (buying and selling on domestic or international markets) of goods and services
= example: the commercial exchange (buying and selling on domestic or international markets) of goods and services
- the business given to a commercial establishment by its customers
= synonyms: patronage
- an equal exchange
= synonyms: barter, swap, swop
- a particular instance of buying or selling
= synonyms: business deal, deal
- people who perform a particular kind of skilled work
= synonyms: craft
- steady winds blowing from east to west above and below the equator
= example: steady winds blowing from east to west above and below the equator
verb
- do business
= synonyms: sell, deal
- exchange or give (something) in exchange for
= synonyms: switch
- turn in as payment or part payment for a purchase
= example: turn in as payment or part payment for a purchase
= synonyms: trade in
- engage in the trade of
= synonyms: merchandise
- be traded at a certain price or under certain conditions
= example: be traded at a certain price or under certain conditions
